about_the_game:
"If I had to choose between my wife and General Galba, of course I'd choose our General! He loves me so much more than that old hag!"


Reports from Vera Cruz is a first-person puzzle adventure game set in the mysterious country of Vera Cruz. You control Alice Veríssima, a young but already disheartened reporter who is sent there as an international correspondent. Now it's up to you to uncover the nation's secrets by talking to the common folk, photographing places of interest and creating news articles about your findings!

  • Explore many corners of Vera Cruz such as a Public School, a Helmet Factory and more!
  • Meet and interview eccentric characters, but always expect the unexpected!
  • Solve puzzles by taking pictures and finding items on the environment!
  • Create your reports! Will you follow General Galba's instructions or will you write about your real findings?
  • Multiple endings to find depending on your journalistic results!

name: Reports from Vera Cruz
short_description: Investigate the country of Vera Cruz in this journalistic first-person adventure! Solve puzzles, take photos of clues and report news exposing the horrific truths behind General Galba and his bizarre government!
